extract package¶

Submodules¶

extract.scrapper module¶

extract.scrapper.collect_hotels(driver, hotel_list)[source]¶
extract.scrapper.collect_reviews(driver, review_list)[source]¶

collect_reviews - this function search and returns all reviews on one page(also archive)

extract.scrapper.force_english_version(driver)[source]¶

force_english_version - Makes site source coherently in english.

extract.scrapper.get_driver()[source]¶

get_driver - This function return web Firefox driver created in headless mode (no visible browser)

extract.scrapper.get_driver_path()[source]¶

get_driver_path - this function reconstruct correct path to Firefox driver. Because GeckoDriverDownloader has been used for driver download, then GeckoDriverDownloader is also use for determine path to driver

extract.scrapper.get_hotels_from_city(city)[source]¶
extract.scrapper.scrap(url)[source]¶

scrap - main scrapping function, in general this function collects and returns all reviews from all pages. For navigation between pages “review_next_page_link” button is used.
